name: OnFire!
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Hokku.OnFire

OnFire! is a plat former where Timmy, the fire man needs to get to the top in order to save a cat. Will it be able?

You'll have to dodge obstacles and get fire coins as you go, which will allow you to unlock new skins and advantages that will come in handy throughout your adventure.
